text: Jared Thomas Goff (born October 14, 1994) is an American football player for the Detroit Lions of the National Football League (NFL). He plays the quarterback position. He was selected first in the 2016 NFL Draft by the Los Angeles Rams. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Los Angeles Rams players Category:Detroit Lions players Category:Football players from California
title: Jared Goff
